summary: Comprehensive regression testing of ReEntry Connect MN completed. All backend APIs (17/17 tests passed - 100%) and frontend features are working correctly. The application successfully provides resource directory, AI chatbot, favorites, language switching, and map functionality.

issues: Category cards have fade-in animation that may cause brief delay in visibility - not a bug, just animation timing

backend: API root endpoint returns welcome message
Resource filtering by category (housing, legal, employment, healthcare, education, food)
Search functionality across name, description, services
POST /api/chat with basic message returns AI response
Chatbot conversational flow - asks clarifying questions first
All resources have valid category IDs
All resources have valid Minnesota coordinates
frontend: Homepage loads with hero section, category cards, emergency hotlines
Resources page loads with list view (113 resources)
Category filter buttons work for all 6 categories
County filter dropdown works (Hennepin county tested)
Map view displays 113 markers with Leaflet
Favorites - add resource to favorites (toast notification appears)
Favorites page displays empty state correctly
Chatbot opens, displays greeting, accepts input
Chatbot returns AI response with conversational flow (asks clarifying questions)
Spanish translations display correctly (Vivienda y Refugio, Asistencia Legal, etc.)
How-To page loads with 8 FAQ topics and 12 external links
Submit Resource form opens and displays all fields
Navigation between all pages works (Home, Resources, How To, Favorites)
Mobile responsive layout with hamburger menu

critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - proper separation of concerns, data-testid attributes present
FavoritesContext uses localStorage correctly for persistence
i18n translations are comprehensive for EN/ES
Backend properly excludes MongoDB _id from responses
Chatbot system prompt correctly implements conversational flow
seed_data_creation: Database already seeded with 113 resources across 6 categories (housing, legal, employment, healthcare, education, food)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Previous iteration mentioned 'map modal overlay' issue - this has been resolved. Map view now loads correctly with 113 markers. Chatbot conversational flow is working as expected (asks clarifying questions before detailed answers). Spanish translations are complete. Favorites persist in localStorage within browser session.
